title: watchOS 9: Here’s what we know so far about new features, supported devices, and more
content:
Now that WWDC 2022 is a couple of weeks from now, we’re gearing up for the release of watchOS 9. This will mark the next major release of Apple’s software platform for the Apple Watch. Head below as we recap all of the latest rumors and expectations for watchOS 9 this year, including new features, release info, and more. 

more…

The post watchOS 9: Here’s what we know so far about new features, supported devices, and more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: watchOS 9 is set to be announced in just a few weeks. Here's what we know so far about new features in watchOS 9, supported devices, more.
